edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.curve

Class PointStream<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.curve.PointStream<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the type of the points in this point-stream
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdaptedPointStream, ArrayPointStream

    public abstract class PointStream<P>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract representation of a relative-indexable stream of generic points. (Advanced functionality).

        public abstract P getAbsolute(int index)
        Returns the point at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - index into the underlying datastructure of this stream. out-of-bounds indices will be handled according to the IndexWrapMode.
        Returns:
        the point at the index

        Parameters:
